title: Selection reprojection history stack
description: Allow chaining selection reprojections with a back stack to restore previous datasets/selection states.

title: Shift-drag selection on canvas selects all images in area
Fix minimap bounds and refit viewport on projection changes
description: Compute projection bounds to scale/offset minimap and auto-fit main viewport when projection settings change.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added projection bounds calculation, minimap scaling/offset, and auto-fit viewport on projection changes.

title: Add left text sidepane
description: Add a left sidepane with removable text chips and input + add button to manage texts used for projection.

title: Selection action bar with reproject option
description: Add a bottom-center contextual menu when images are selected, including deselect and reproject-with-selection; wire to projection pipeline.

title: Server-side UMAP for text labels
description: Use /umap API to accept list of text strings and return UMAP coords that include text embeddings; update frontend to send texts and use server response instead of umap-js.

title: Improve create dataset UX with upload loading and UI disable
description: Add a clear loading indicator while images are being posted after dataset creation and disable the creation UI during upload.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added upload overlay + disabled UI during dataset creation/upload in web/src/pages/index.tsx.

title: Handle pending datasets and prevent premature embedding jobs
description: Show pending state after create/upload; block navigation to canvas until ready; ensure embeddings creation is only triggered automatically after upload completes.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added backend guard to block context building until dataset is ready; added pending/error gating for canvas route and disabled canvas/street-view in dataset info (pending label + messaging).

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added pending badge + embedding progress bar on start page; added embedding progress bar to dataset/pending canvas views; added embedding progress updates in backend job state and exposed job state in datasets list.

title: Add per-dataset sqlite image mapping + migration script
description: Create per-dataset SQLite DB with images(id,path) and tags scaffolding; add migration script for existing datasets; document plan.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Hooked dataset DB init into create_dataset; added api/dataset_db.py; migration script now reuses shared schema helpers.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added dataset-scoped tag CRUD endpoints backed by dataset SQLite; routes for tags collection, tag deletion, and per-image tag assignments.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added SAO terms search endpoint and canvas tagger UI wired to SAO search + tag CRUD routes.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Adjusted SAO search ranking to prefer prefix matches; enlarged tag panel height and suggestion list.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added SAO term embedding cache and image tag-suggestion endpoint; TaggerPanel now shows top-3 AI suggestions.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Enhanced tag suggestions: propagate manual tags from nearest neighbors before falling back to SAO-CLIP suggestions.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Seeded tags from legacy metadata keywords when matching SAO terms; ensured images table initialized on processing/context; neighbor suggestions now include legacy tags.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added metadata keyword seeding callable via /datasets/<id>/seed-tags-from-metadata; seeding skips images with manual tags and returns counts.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added /dataset/:id info page with metadata summary and button to seed tags from metadata when available.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added tag-stats endpoint and surfaced total images + tagged percentage on dataset info page.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Seeding now loads metadata.xlsx directly when needed; uses filename mapping to keywords even if metadata_source isn't legacy.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added tagged grid projection: new /tagged-images endpoint and canvas view splitting tagged vs untagged grids.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added taggedImagesRevisionAtom and bump on tag add/remove so tagged/untagged grid updates live.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added SAO term projection view: backend /terms/sao/umap with cached UMAP; frontend projection type 'sao' renders all SAO terms as text points.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added server-side logging for SAO UMAP cache hits and compute timing.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added SAO term downsampling based on viewport zoom to avoid rendering 35k labels; viewport scale tracked via atom.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added spatial binning for SAO terms; render one label per grid cell based on zoom level to keep UI responsive.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Culled SAO text rendering to viewport bounds; visible bounds tracked from viewport and passed to EmbeddingsLayer.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Optimized SAO text rendering: disable hover sizing and pointer events, reduce font size; normalize SAO UMAP points server-side and cap labels per zoom.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added SAO view toggle to show only dataset tag labels; projection settings updated and tags fetched from /tags.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added SAO word selection: clicking a term opens bottom-right panel with images for that tag; new /tags/images endpoint.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: SAO tag selection now replaces right-side panel; clicking empty canvas clears selected tag.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added tag-based suggestion endpoint using average embedding; tag results panel now shows suggested untagged images.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added bulk tag assignment endpoint /tags/assign and UI selection footer for suggested images; tagging refreshes suggestions.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added tagged view grouping by tag with headers and new /tags/with-images endpoint; UI toggle in projection settings.

comments.author: sebastianandreasson
comments.text: Added multi-tag selection: UI shift-click to select multiple tags; new multi-tag image/suggestion endpoints; bulk assign supports multiple labels.
